item.description:
Need a break from the stress of work, the economy, and everyday life? Looking for something to do that is fun, free, and progressive?

Join us for Games for Justice at Veggie Planet on February 28 from 2-4:30pm! Arrive by yourself or bring a friend.

Scrabble, Boggle, Apples to Apples, Scattegories - what's your favorite board game? Bring it!

Look no further if you're seeking like-minded folks to game with, want to cross-promote your events and campaigns while you Boggle, or are new to the area and looking for groups to get involved in. If you want to build a strong cross-issue social justice movement, SoJust is for you!

Haven't been to Veggie Planet? The food is delicious! Veggie Planet is dedicated to supporting local farmers and donate a percentage of their profits to other organizations working for social and environmental change. Check out their menu filled with vegetarian and vegan options.

Veggie Planet is located at Club Passim in Harvard Square. Cash only.

Want to connect outside of SoJust events? Members can view and post events, job & volunteer announcements, roommate searches, etc. on the 'Message Board' and are encouraged to suggest and co-host events.

Wanna know more about SoJust? Check out our Frequently Asked Questions and Event Photos. Learn about our Suggested Annual Membership Fee.
item.name: Games for Justice
